content.name: kuertee UI Extensions and HUD
content.author: kuertee
content.description:
UI Extensions and HUD https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/552 Code: https://github.com/kuertee/x4-mod-ui-extensions.git by kuertee
What this is: ============= Modded Lua files with callbacks to allow more than one mod to change the same UI element. Functionality to add new HUD elements to the Top Level Menu.
